title: adhi purIshvaram
sahitya:
aadi pureeswaram sadaa bhajEham

tripura sundaree samEta vara guruguha janakam

vandita munisha mukham

(aadi)



samaashTi caraNam



vidhi haripoojita tyaagaraajaangam

aaditya kOTi prakaasha lingam 



madhyama kaalam



nandi poojita swayambu lingam

naakaka vacatara saikaTa lingam



ciTTai swaram
